thread.title: Imports Dragon Takes Fashion Angels Under Its Wings

author: cbs8
title: Imports Dragon Takes Fashion Angels Under Its Wings
text:
Imports Dragon
MONTREAL , Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ - Imports Dragon is excited to announce its strategic partnership with Fashion Angels , the leading designer and manufacturer of tween girls' lifestyle and activity products.
In a deal penned with Fashion Angels Enterprises , Imports Dragon will be the exclusive distribution partner in Canada and take the lead on marketing, brand development and licensing, effective January 1, 2016 . The portfolio of brands includes Fashion Angels ™ , Style.Lab by Fashion Angels ™ and all other licensed products.
"We couldn't be more thrilled to add Fashion Angels to our growing roster of brands," said Stephan Tetrault , CEO, Imports Dragon . "Fashion forward tween girls and the DIY crowd are already familiar with Fashion Angels as a leading lifestyle brand and we are proud to offer this growing brand in Canada ."
"We believe that by partnering with such a respected and accomplished partner, we will be able to elevate our service to the Canadian market to a significantly higher level," said Mark Miller , CEO, Fashion Angels Enterprises . "The team at Imports Dragon is composed of talented and experienced people who pride themselves on their service, communication, commitment and passion for the toy industry and we are thrilled to be working together."
Fashion Angels product lines for tween girls include activity kits, fashion sketch books, DIY crafts, licensed products, fashion accessories, room décor, and natural beauty care. They can be found in specialty shops, mass retailers, and department stores around the world.
Imports Dragon will be showcasing the Fashion Angels product lines at Fall Toy Preview in Dallas , October 6 through 8, 2015 . All interested parties are invited to schedule an appointment with Stephanie Landry , Brand Manager, Imports Dragon at s.landry@importsdragon.com
About Imports Dragon:
Founded in 1998, Imports Dragon is one of the fastest-growing toy & game distributing and manufacturing companies in Canada with offices in Toronto , Boisbriand and Shenzhen . For almost 20 years, Imports Dragon has been synonymous with some of the world's most popular brands including Shopkins, Johnny Test , The Trash Pack, Caillou and most recently the NHL with a line of toys and games due to release this fall.
